ai-ja278:1.2_0: their minds are hard to find again.
ai-ja278:1.4_0: you make an end of suffering.
ai-ja278:2.3_0: even if fools were to lose their wounds;
ai-ja278:2.4_0: if there’s no-one to put a stop to them.”
ai-ja278:3.1_0: “I’m the one who thinks he is wise,
ai-ja278:3.4_0: It would be appropriate for me to think.”
ai-ja278:4.1_0: the eighth King of the earthquake.
